title: Let's Sue Fortnite, Let's Sue Red Dead - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.15.19
description:
The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/kindafunnygamesdaily to start your trial now.

Everybody's suing everybody, so Andrea and Greg try to bring peace to the industry in today's show.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:12 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:04:34 - Mom of ‘Fortnite’ Superfan Orange Shirt Kid Sues Epic Over Use of His Dance
00:12:06 - Fortnite Re-Adds Redeploy
00:15:07 - RED DEAD REDEMPTION 2 PUBLISHER SUING OVER PINKERTON USE
00:20:15 - Out today
00:25:28 - SkillShare
Reader mail   -
00:27:19 - Do you think Anthem matchmaking is a good idea or possibly will end badly? - David Scott
00:32:50 - Should I get back into Destiny 2? - Andrew Dramis
00:36:35 - Will there be a New York Meet Up? - Dapper Stephen
00:38:35 - Do you see a shift to episodic games and release schedules, akin to Life is Strange or the recent Hitman 1? - Sent the Prophet
00:41:30 - Squad Up: Cassidy Harver - PS4/PC, Avarice_Of_Man
00:44:26 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Whitta

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
